## R Markdown

```{r}
img <- png::readPNG("soccerfield.png")
```

```{r}
longBallClean %>% gf_jitter(longbally ~ longballx, color =~ LongBallSuccess, width = 1, height = 1) + scale_fill_continuous(guide = FALSE) + annotation_custom(rasterGrob(img, width = unit(0.8, "npc"),height = unit(1.20,"npc")),-Inf, Inf, -Inf, Inf) + lims(x=c(-0.6,4.6), y = c(0,5))
```
